docs.abstract: Pulitzer Prize winning composer John Luther Adams and his wife are not casual baseball fans--it is their avocation; Adams notes many of the composers of his generation are serious baseball fans, saying there is something about the sport that appeals to the mind of the composer.

headline.seo: With Composer’s Mind-Set, John Luther Adams Obsesses Over Baseball
